page.title: 15Frickley Athletic F.C.
page.content: {Frickley Athletic Football Club, founded by the miners in 1910,is in {Westfield Lane}and the ground's {capacity is 10,000.}Its highest gate was 6500 in 1971 against Rotherham.The average home gate is 500.Frickley have only been past the first round of the {F.A. Cup }once,in November 1984 when they beat Stalybridge and then lost against fourth division Darlington.Frickley are in the{Gola {League}and are sponsored by Reading Bailey.The manager,Sean Marshall,is a player manager.The ground is situated next to Broad Lane School and the pit and adjacent to the local cricket club.The players have jobs but they are{semi_professional.}They enjoy themselves in the players' lounge.It is a lively room,both comfortable and cosy,with a bar,built by the players under the main stand.
